name: Lorem_maxLengthSentenceTest
description: Unit tests for the maxLengthSentence method in the Lorem class.

test_cases.name: testMaxLengthSentenceWithZeroLength
test_cases.description: Tests the maxLengthSentence method with a length of zero.

test_cases.name: testMaxLengthSentenceWithPositiveLength
test_cases.description: Tests the maxLengthSentence method with a positive length.

test_cases.name: testMaxLengthSentenceWithSpaceAtEnd
test_cases.description: Tests the maxLengthSentence method to ensure the result does not end with a space.
